#cloud-config
users:
  - name: centos
    ssh-authorized-keys:
      - @@{INSTANCE_PUBLIC_KEY}@@
    sudo: ['ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD:ALL']

action_list.description: System action for installing an application

attrs.script:
#!/bin/bash
set -ex

INTERNAL_IP=@@{address}@@

# set hostname
sudo hostnamectl set-hostname --static ${NODE_NAME}

# set 
echo "${INTERNAL_IP} ${NODE_NAME}" | sudo tee -a /etc/hosts

# -*- Pre-requisites
# git required for ansible-pull
sudo yum install git -y
sudo yum install epel-release -y

# update to latest 
sudo yum update -y

# install ansible
sudo yum install ansible -y

# install docker from github.com/calm-marketplace
sudo git clone https://github.com/calm-marketplace/docker /var/projects/docker
sudo ansible-galaxy -vvv install -r /var/projects/docker/requirements.yml
sudo ansible-playbook -vvv /var/projects/docker/local.yml

action_list.name: action_install

action_list.description: System action for creating an application
action_list.name: action_create

action_list.description: System action for uninstalling an application
